Contradict fact: The claim falsely attributes a quote to former President Ronald Reagan when in fact it was said by Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks evidence or support to prove that Ronald Reagan actually made the quoted statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the quote belongs to Ronald Reagan without verifying its authenticity.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert provides an alternative explanation by stating that the quote originated from Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels, co-authors of The Communist Manifesto.
